import React from 'react'; class DayCast extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { values: 0, day: "", start: 0, conditions: 0, descriptions: 0 } } static getDerivedStateFromProps(props,state){ return ({day: props.day, values: props.values, start: props.start, conditions: props.conditions, descriptions: props.descriptions}); } render(){ return(
{this.state.day}

{"3:00"} {this.state.values[this.state.start+1]} {this.state.conditions[this.state.start+1]} {"3:00"} {this.state.values[this.state.start+5]} {this.state.conditions[this.state.start+5]}
{"6:00"} {this.state.values[this.state.start+2]} {this.state.conditions[this.state.start+2]} {"6:00"} {this.state.values[this.state.start+6]} {this.state.conditions[this.state.start+6]}
{"9:00"} {this.state.values[this.state.start+3]} {this.state.conditions[this.state.start+3]} {"9:00"}{this.state.values[this.state.start+7]} {this.state.conditions[this.state.start+7]}
